changeSet.author: Jersonmade
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO _product (id, name, article, description, category, price, quantity, last_quantity_change, created_at) SELECT uuid_generate_v4(), 'Product ' || gs, 'Article ' || gs, 'Description of product ' || gs, 'Category ' || gs, FLOOR(RANDOM() * 1000), FLOOR(RANDOM() * 100), NOW(), NOW() FROM generate_series(1, 100000) gs;
